content: this legal text explains the progress of a legal case involving mr sg and mrs nk who are both registered individuals they got divorced in 2012 and have two children together the couple had a marriage contract amendment in 2007 which nk later tried to have declared null and void in court but was unsuccessful in 2018 a notary was appointed to liquidate their matrimonial property regime they agreed to sell a portion of the land and divide the proceeds nk has the option to buy back sgs share of the property for 350000â‚¬ with a deposit of 280000â‚¬ from the sale of the land the sale is scheduled for march 22 2022 if nk fails to pay the remaining balance within six months sg can demand payment with interest nk will bear the property costs and the costs related to the sale will be shared equally each party is responsible for their own notary costs and fees they also waive any rights or claims against each other the agreement is confidential and binding on both parties
